title: Love, Hate, Love, Hate
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Maki-chan will slowly like mikan~, love mikan~, love love mikan~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….What are you doing, swinging a 5 yen coin in front of other people like that….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Huh? Did you not get hypnotized? That’s strange. It worked on Riko-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>There’s no way that kind of hypnosis will work!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeh~, really. Alright then, Maki-chan, try it on me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….There’s no helping it. Then, look clo~sely on this 5 yen coin…. When you see a mikan, you will want to talk to it~, want to talk to it~.... Just joking<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Mikan-san!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh!? Wait…. You didn’t really get hypnotized right….? Hey! Chika!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Mikan-san! Your mikan colors are always lovely! You’re always so delicious and on top of that, beautiful, amazing! I love you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Chika----!!?? What is this situation, I don’t get it anymore!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
